overview:
Danielle brings over 15 years of finance, accounting and operations experience to Drobo.

Previously, Danielle served as Vice President, Corporate Controller at IronPort Systems where she was responsible for building and leading the accounting and sales operations functions, and was instrumental in the $830M acquisition by Cisco Systems in June 2007. Prior to IronPort, she was Corporate Controller at Packeteer, and Vice President, Corporate Controller and Chief Accounting Officer at Brio Software until it was acquired by Hyperion Solutions. Danielle started her career in the Silicon Valley office of Arthur Andersen. Danielle earned her Bachelor of Science degree in Accounting from Central Washington University in Ellensburg, Washington.
